author: rbb
msg: Move ap_generic_hook from the Apache include directory to the apr-util
include directory.  The hooks themselves are implemented by apr-util,
instead of Apache.  This removes a few warnings when compiled in
maintainer-mode that have been bothering me.

author: rbb
msg: Clean up two memory leaks in the bucket code.

author: gstein
msg: use the '.include ".../rules.mk"' makefile syntax for the BSDi platform.

author: ake
msg: make Windows build aware of export variable name change :

author: ben
msg: Generic hooks (and a demo content filter module).
